ability_description.TIME_TRAVEL: Go back in time to retrieve the lost health. All allies have their negative status cleared and are healed by [25,SP] HP.

ability_description.GOLD_RUSH: Deals  [20,SP] + your amount of GOLD as SPECIAL, then earn 2 GOLD
ability_description.MAKE_IT_RAIN: Deals [100,SP] + your amount of GOLD as SPECIAL
ability_description.CRUSH_GRIP: The target is crushed with great force. The more HP the target has left, the greater the damage: between [20,SP] and [200,SP] PHYSICAL.

ability_description.OVERDRIVE: Deal [120,SP]% of ATK as SPECIAL in a 3-range radius by twanging an electric guitar, causing a huge echo and strong vibration. The damage is reduced with the distance, 20% per cell.
ability_description.LOVELY_KISS: Kisses the enemy with a frightening expression. Puts the enemy SLEEP for [2,4,SP] seconds.
ability_description.TRANSFORM: Takes the appearance and the statistics of its target (except HP)
ability_description.PSYCHIC_FANGS: Inflicts [100,SP] PHYSICAL and removes all the target's ATK, DEF and SPE_DEF buffs
ability_description.SHED_TAIL: Create a substitute and charge towards the ally with the fewest HP to give it [80, SP] SHIELD
ability_description.NIGHT_SLASH: Deal [15,30,60,SP] SPECIAL with a [30,60,90]% increased CRIT_CHANCE ratio
ability_description.KOWTOW_CLEAVE: Deal 150% ATK + [20,SP]% per fallen ally as TRUE. Can crit by default
ability_description.SHIELDS_DOWN: Transform Minior to a random core form
ability_description.SHIELDS_UP: Transform Minior to its meteor form
ability_description.SANDSEAR_STORM: Searingly hot sand that strikes all enemies in a straight line, dealing [80,SP] SPECIAL and BURN for 4 seconds
ability_description.WILDBOLT_STORM: Thunderous tempest that strikes all enemies in a straight line, dealing [80,SP] SPECIAL and PARALYSIS for 4 seconds
ability_description.BLEAKWIND_STORM: Savagely cold winds that strike all enemies in a straight line, dealing [80,SP] SPECIAL and FREEZE for 2 seconds
ability_description.SPRINGTIDE_STORM: Fierce winds brimming with love and hate all enemies in a straight line, dealing [80,SP] SPECIAL and CHARM for 2 seconds
ability_description.AURA_WHEEL: Deals [60,SP] SPECIAL and switch to Hangry form
ability_description.AURA_WHEEL_HANGRY: Deals [60,SP] SPECIAL and switch to Normal form
ability_description.LICK: Deals [30,60,120,SP] SPECIAL. The target is CONFUSION and PARALYSIS for 3 seconds
ability_description.TICKLE: Reduce ATK and DEF of the [1,2] closest targets by [3,SP]
ability_description.AROMATHERAPY: Clear negative status alterations and heal [20,40,80,SP] HP of adjacent allies
ability_description.DETECT: PROTECT adjacent allies for [0.5,SP] seconds mutiplied by the number of adjacent enemies
ability_description.SPACIAL_REND: Reverse the position of the enemy team, then deals [100,SP] SPECIAL to all enemies in a row
ability_description.RKS_SYSTEM: Deals [30,SP] SPECIAL to adjacent enemies. Heal adjacent pokémons for [20,SP] if they have a type in common with the caster

effect_description.SPORE: Restore 30 HP every 2 seconds. A berry can be picked every stage.

effect_description.GOLDEN_EGGS: Eggs can be sold for 10 GOLD, no limit for amount of eggs on the bench

5 SPECIAL per second (GROUND are immune)
+30% CONFUSION duration
effect_description.RAIN:
+3 PP per second
-30% BURN and POISONNED damage
effect_description.STORM:
Lightning randomly falls on the board (ELECTRIC are immune)
+30% PARALYSIS duration
effect_description.HYDRATATION: GRASS synergy is healing 5 additional HP per second under the RAIN
effect_description.ETERNAL_LIGHT: Also increase DEF and SPE_DEF by 50% and give RUNE_PROTECT for 10 seconds

effect_description.RUN_AWAY: +50% ATK and move speed, 10% chance to find WILD pokemons
effect_description.HUSTLE: +80% ATK and move speed, 15% chance to find WILD pokemons
effect_description.BERSERK: +120% ATK and move speed, 20% chance to find WILD pokemons. RAGE 5 seconds sooner

item_description.ICE_STONE: The holder gains the ICE type

item_description.MAX_REVIVE: Give RESURECTION, preventing the holder first KO and restoring to max HP
item_description.ROCKY_HELMET: +12 DEF. Negates critical bonus damage from incoming critical hits.

item_description.SITRUS_BERRY: Consumed once below 50% HP, heal 30 HP and increase all healing received by 50%

item_description.MAGMARIZER: Every successful attack increase ATK by 1 and inflicts BURN for 4 seconds
item_description.TOXIC_ORB: Gives POISON synergy. Holder is POISONNED but increase its ATK by 100%
item_description.METRONOME: Gives SOUND synergy. Every second, the holder gains 5 PP
item_description.METAL_COAT: Gives STEEL synergy. Reduce incoming damage by 20%
item_description.SWIFT_WING: Gives FLYING synergy. Gain 10% chance to dodge attacks.

item_description.INCENSE: Gives FLORA synergy. Every attack received has a 10% chance to make the attacker CHARM for 2 seconds.
item_description.EXP_SHARE: Get the best ATK, DEF and SPE_DEF values of adjacent allies in the same row

passive_description.TYROGUE:
Will choose a combat discipline based on the first item given:
CHARCOAL MAGNET: $t(pkm.HITMONLEE)
HEART_SCALE NEVER_MELT_ICE: $t(pkm.HITMONCHAN)
Others: $t(pkm.HITMONTOP)
passive_description.PROTEAN2: The pokemon acquires the typing of the 2 highest synergies on the team
passive_description.PROTEAN3: The pokemon acquires the typing of the 3 highest synergies on the team
passive_description.CASTFORM: Castform changes its form and the weather to SUN, RAIN or SNOW depending on your dominant synergy between FIRE WATER ICE
passive_description.PHIONE: Phione is looking for an AQUA_EGG
passive_description.PRIMAL: Legend has it that you could unleash the ancient powers of these pokemons
passive_description.WONDER_GUARD: Reduce received damage and received healing to 1

passive_description.GRASSY_TERRAIN: Give GRASS_FIELD to your GRASS Pokemon, boosting their damage by 20%
passive_description.MISTY_TERRAIN: Give FAIRY_FIELD to your FAIRY Pokemon, boosting their damage by 20%
passive_description.PSYCHIC_TERRAIN: Give PSYCHIC_FIELD to your Psychic Pokemon, boosting their damage by 20%
passive_description.EEVEE: Eevee can evolve into one of the 8 Eeveelutions when given a synergy stone
passive_description.TYPE_NULL: $t(pkm.TYPE_NULL) can evolve into $t(Silvally) when given a synergy stone
passive_description.SUDOWOODO:
Pretends to be a tree and does not attack but gain [2,4] ATK per second instead (stackable).
Starts attacking when PP bar is full, cannot be SILENCE or lose PP until then.
passive_description.WOBBUFFET: Does not move or attack until PP bar is full, cannot be SILENCE or lose PP until then.
passive_description.DITTO: Ditto can transform to create a copy of the basic form of one of your pokemons you drop it over (not Unique, Legendary or Hatch)
passive_description.EGG: You can feel something moving inside
passive_description.HATCH: Hatched pokemons evolve automatically after 5 stages

passive_description.AIRLOCK: Neutralize weather effects, getting back to NEUTRAL
passive_description.WURMPLE:
Wurmple evolves depending on the weather at the previous stage:
Cascoon: NIGHT, STORM, SANDSTORM, SNOW
Silcoon: SUN, RAIN, MISTY, WINDY
Random if NEUTRAL
passive_description.HYDRATATION: GRASS synergy is healing 5 additional HP per second under the RAIN
passive_description.SHARED_VISION: Shared vision: all Pokemon with shared vision will attack the same target, if at range
passive_description.WATER_SPRING: Whenever an enemy uses their ability, gain 5 PP
passive_description.GIRATINA: Giratina switches between its Altered Forme and Origin Forme depending on its position on the board
passive_description.UNOWN: Unown cannot hold items and vanish after one fight or after casting their ability
passive_description.GLIGAR: Gligar is looking for a RAZOR_FANG. If the Pokémon is POISONNED, it will gain HP instead of taking damage
passive_description.POISON_HEAL: If the Pokémon is POISONNED, it will gain HP instead of taking damage
passive_description.GRIM_NEIGH: When the Pokémon knocks out an enemy, it emits a terrifying whinny sound that increases its AP by 30
passive_description.SHAYMIN: Shaymin is looking for a GRACIDEA_FLOWER
passive_description.BEAST_BOOST_ATK: Upon kill, the pokémon gains 5 ATK
passive_description.BEAST_BOOST_AP: Upon kill, the pokémon gains 10% AP
passive_description.CHINGLING: Chingling is looking for a STAR_DUST
passive_description.CHIMECHO: Resonates to sounds from adjacent allies, which doubles their cry while Chimecho is alive
passive_description.RAICHU: Raichu is looking for a DAWN_STONE
passive_description.SURGE_SURFER: The surge surfer gets +30% ATK_SPEED in ELECTRIC_FIELD or PSYCHIC_FIELD
passive_description.MEGA_LAUNCHER: This pokémon ability emits 3 SOUND cries instead of one

passive_description.SPOT_PANDA: The pokémon is immune to CONFUSION and deals [100,SP]% additional SPECIAL to pokemons CONFUSION
passive_description.GUTS: The pokémon gains 5 ATK as long as it is BURN or POISONNED
passive_description.STENCH: Leaves behind a stinking cloud that POISONNED any unit that breathes it

passive_description.SLOWBRO: Slowbro is looking for a KINGS_ROCK

passive_description.CLEFAIRY: Clefairy is looking for a POKE_DOLL

passive_description.PRISM: Necrozma switches between its Ultra form and Normal form depending on its exposure to LIGHT
passive_description.BLOSSOM: Cherrim switches between its Sunlight form and Normal form depending on its exposure to LIGHT
passive_description.SPECIAL_ATTACK: Basic attacks deal SPECIAL and scale with AP
passive_description.NINCADA: After evolving, get Shedninja as well if you have a free space on your bench
passive_description.FAMILY: The pokémon grows with time (turn 15 and turn 20)
passive_description.SAND_STREAM: The pokémon count as 3 for SANDSTORM
passive_description.DRIZZLE: The pokémon count as 3 for RAIN
passive_description.HARVEST: At the start of each fight, add a random berry to pokemon items. If full, berry is added to player items instead.
passive_description.COCONUT: Exeggutor is looking for a LEAF_STONE
passive_description.GLUTTON: Permanently gains 20 max HP every time it eats a berry
passive_description.COMFEY: Comfey cannot hold items. At the start of the fight, the nearest ally with a free item slot wears Comfey and gains all its stats. Comfey casts its ability at the same time than its holder. When its holder is KO, Comfey fights on its own.
passive_description.TYPHLOSION: Typhlosion is looking for a REAPER_CLOTH
passive_description.HISUIAN_TYPHLOSION: The pokémon inflicts 20% extra damage on a BURN or SILENCE target
passive_description.PICKUP: The pokémon will start with a random item if it's not holding anything
passive_description.MAWILE: Mawile fools the foes with its docile-looking face. Cast $t(ability.ATTRACT) at the start of the fight.
passive_description.CORSOLA: $t(pkm.CORSOLA) evolves into $t(pkm.GALAR_CORSOLA) after being KO once
passive_description.CELEBI: The player regains 1 HP every time $t(pkm.CELEBI) casts $t(ability.TIME_TRAVEL).
passive_description.GHOLDENGO: At the start of each fight, if the player has 50 GOLD or more, $t(pkm.GHOLDENGO) gains RUNE_PROTECT for the entire fight
passive_description.METEOR:
$t(pkm.MINIOR) alternates between its meteor and core forms. The meteor form grants [4,SP]% ATK_SPEED per attack.
 Core form attacks apply additional effects on target and adjacent enemies:
 Blue: Deals 100% SPECIAL
 Red: Deals 150% PHYSICAL
 Orange: Deals 50% TRUE
 Green: Attack damage heals adjacent allies
passive_description.MIMIKYU: When hit under 50% HP, Mimikyu changes into its Busted Form, gaining 30% ATK_SPEED and PROTECT for 2 seconds
passive_description.MIMIKYU_BUSTED: Its neck is broken. Mimikyu will never forget the person who damaged its rag for as long as it is still alive.
passive_description.HUNGER_SWITCH:
$t(pkm.MORPEKO) alternates between its normal and hangry forms.
 Normal form attacks inflicts PARALYSIS for 2s
 Hangry form attacks inflicts WOUND for 4s

stat_description.ATK: Damage inflicted on each basic attack
stat_description.ATK_SPEED: Number of attacks per second. Maximum 2.5.
stat_description.CRIT_CHANCE: Critical hits deal 2x more damage. Abilities cannot crit by default. Crit chance over 100% is converted to Crit damage.
stat_description.CRIT_DAMAGE: Multiplier for critical hits additional damage
stat_description.HP: Pokémon is knocked out when it no longer has Health Points
stat_description.MAX_PP: Amount of PP required to cast ability. Pokemons receive PP over time (10 per second), when attacking (5 per attack) and when receiving damage (10% of incoming damage)
stat_description.AP: Increase SPECIAL and ability effects in various ways.
stat_description.SHIELD: Temporary health points, cannot be healed.

status_description.BURN: Deals 5% of max HP as TRUE every second. Reduce healing by 50%.
status_description.SILENCE: Prevents casting abilities and gaining PP
status_description.POISONNED: Deals 5% of max HP per stack as TRUE every second. Can stack up to 3 times by default.
status_description.PROTECT: Protects from any source of damage, but prevents PP gain
status_description.SLEEP: Prevents moving, dodging or attacking. Receiving attacks reduces the duration of the effect.
status_description.CONFUSION: Force to change target all the time and sometimes deal damage to itself
status_description.RAGE: Double damage and speed, half shield, healing, freeze and sleep durations, lose PROTECT. All units become RAGE after 35 seconds of fight.
status_description.RESURECTION: Prevents KO once, restoring to max HP
status_description.PARALYSIS: Reduce ATK_SPEED and move speed by 40%, prevents dodging attacks
status_description.CHARM: Prevents attacking the target and forces to get closer to it
status_description.CURSE: KOs the cursed pokemon after some time

synergy_description.NORMAL: NORMAL pokemons and their adjacent allies gain SHIELD when combat starts
synergy_description.GRASS: GRASS pokemons heal and produce berries over time
synergy_description.FIRE: FIRE pokemons gain ATK after every hit and have a chance to BURN their enemies for 2 seconds
synergy_description.WATER: WATER pokemons have a chance to dodge basic attacks. A new WATER pokemon is fished after each PvP turn and put on your bench.
synergy_description.ELECTRIC: ELECTRIC pokemons basic attacks can trigger two additional attacks
synergy_description.FIGHTING: FIGHTING pokemons block a flat amount of damage on every hit received
synergy_description.PSYCHIC: PSYCHIC pokemons gain additional AP and attract Unowns
synergy_description.DARK: DARK pokemons critical hits are more powerful and more frequent. Melee Dark pokemons jump to the farthest target reachable.
synergy_description.STEEL: STEEL pokemons deal a percentage of their damage as TRUE
synergy_description.GROUND: GROUND pokemons gain bonus ATK, DEF and SPE_DEF every 3 seconds.
synergy_description.POISON: POISON pokemons have a chance to POISONNED their target for 4 seconds with their basic attacks. Poison inflicts TRUE over time.
synergy_description.DRAGON: DRAGON amplify synergies and gains more stats when fully evolved.
synergy_description.FIELD: When a FIELD pokemon dies, all the other FIELD pokemons are healed and gain ATK_SPEED
synergy_description.MONSTER: MONSTER pokemons can FLINCH their opponents. Every time they get a KO, they gain stats, heal and grow in size.
synergy_description.HUMAN: HUMAN pokemons seek to stay on their feet. All your team heals for a percentage of the damage they deal with attacks and abilities
synergy_description.AQUATIC: AQUATIC pokemons have a chance to steal PP from their target at every basic attack
synergy_description.BUG: At the start of the combat, your strongest BUG pokemons are cloned
synergy_description.FLYING: FLYING pokemons fly away when they fell under a certain amount of HP
synergy_description.FLORA: When the first FLORA pokemon is dead, a flower will rise from its grave...
synergy_description.ROCK: ROCK pokemons gain DEF and better resist to critical damage
synergy_description.GHOST: GHOST pokemons have 25% chance to SILENCE on hit and apply various curses on opponents at the start of the fight
synergy_description.FAIRY: Whenever FAIRY pokemons deal or receive a critical hit, they receive a shock if at melee range, or are CHARM for 2 seconds if not at range
synergy_description.ICE: ICE pokemons have a chance to FREEZE the enemy for 2 seconds after a hit and give SPE_DEF to the whole team
synergy_description.FOSSIL: On their first KO, FOSSIL pokemons come back to life with increased ATK
synergy_description.SOUND: SOUND pokemons emit a cry when they use their abilities, waking up allies asleep and giving them bonus stats
synergy_description.ARTIFICIAL: ARTIFICIAL pokemons give unique items and gain ATK, AP and SHIELD when holding items
synergy_description.BABY: BABY can bring you Pokemon Eggs to comfort you after a defeat
synergy_description.LIGHT: LIGHT reveal a spotlight on the battlefield. The unit standing in the spotlight at the start of combat gains unique bonuses.
synergy_description.WILD: WILD pokemons get increased ATK, move faster, can WOUND their target after an attack, and attract more WILD pokemons.

faq.official_game_answer: No, this is a fan game; made by fans, for fans. All rights/credits to Pokemon Company.
faq.how_pokemon_evolve_answer: You need 3 copies of the same pokemon to get the evolution. The 3 pokemons will merge to give the evolved pokemon. Hatch Pokemon that come from eggs evolve automatically with time every 5 stages.
faq.income_answer: You get 5 gold per round whether you draw, win or lose. You get 1 bonus income per 10 gold saved. A maximum of 5 bonus income accrued at 50 saved gold. You get 1 bonus gold if you win. If you win multiple times, you will also gain extra gold; one bonus gold for every victory/defeat, up to 5 bonus gold for 5 streak wins / 5 streak defeat. Wins/Defeats against PVE are not taken into account.
faq.collection: What is the purpose of the collection/booster ?
faq.collection_answer: When opening boosters, you get pokemon shards. Those shards are specific to every pokemon. In the collection tab, you can buy pokemon emotions with those shards. You can see pokemon emotions as a detailed customization. When selecting an emotion pokemon portrait, the pokemon will appear everywhere with the same emotion portrait that you have selected. Eveyone will see the emotion that you picked for this pokemon. Moreover, if you have selected a shiny emotion, the pokemon will appear shiny to everyone else.
faq.avatars: How do I get new avatars ?
faq.avatars_answer: When buying a pokemon emotion, it will be available in your profile avatar list.
faq.boosters_answer: You gain boosters each time you level up.
faq.level_answer: You gain experience each time you finish a game. If you finish first, you'll get 700 xp, if you finish last, you'll get 100 xp.
faq.sprite: It seems some sprites are missing ?
faq.sprite_answer2: If you want the missing sprites to be added, please consider donating to pokemon autochess. Every donation will be used to pay spriters to make sprites for everyone.
faq.sprite_answer1: Sprites of pokemon auto chess are based on
faq.mythical: How do I get unique / legendary pokemons ?
faq.mythical_answer: On stages 10 and 20, portals with synergy symbols will appear. Entering a portal will give the opportunity to select one of six powerful Pokemon, with each symbol guaranteeing a synergy of one of the Pokemon. If no portal is entered, all Pokemon options will be entirely random. Symbols are determined by the synergy levels reached by each remaining player, with 4 symbols per player chosen randomly from a pool of one symbol per each of their reached synergy levels.
faq.ditto_answer: Ditto creates a plain copy of the unit you hover and drop it over. Each pokemon in shop has a 0.5% chance to be a Ditto at every roll. You can't copy mythical pokemons.
faq.items_answer: You can gain item components by winning PvE rounds or picking one in an item carousel. You can combine two item components to create a powerful tier 2 item. Every pokemon can hold up to 3 items. The crafting list of all items is available in the wiki, in the items section.
faq.bots_answer: Bots are created by other players. Bots are theme-based, a mewtwo bot will always have an mewtwo in its team at a certain time in the game. Bots have a list of predefined teams at each stage.
faq.create_bot: Can i create my own bot ?
faq.create_bot_answer: Sure. You'll need to be at least level 20 to unlock the Bot Builder gadget. You can use it to create and submit your bot, it will be sent in the #bot-creation channel on Discord for a review by the bot reviewers team.
faq.elo: How does the elo system work ?
faq.elo_answer: The elo system in Pokemon Auto Chess works the same as in other elo based games like Chess, Lol, Starcraft etc... To gain elo points, you need to beat other players. The higher your opponent's elo, the more elo you will gain by defeating him, and vice versa. If you don't play for 10 days, your elo will start to decay (-10 elo/day).
faq.missing_points: I didn't get elo points in my last game, why ?
faq.missing_points_answer: The game needs to be finished in order to win/lose elo points. If someone is still in game, you need to wait. Bots do not give elo, only human players are accounted for elo rating. It is also possible that the game had elo disabled ("Just for fun" mode)
faq.damage_label: What are the special damages and physical damages ?
faq.damage_answer: Auto attacks mostly deal Physical damage, while Abilities mostly deal Special damage. Some abilities however can deal true damage or physical damage.
faq.defense: Can you tell me how defense works? Is it flat damage reduction?
faq.defense_answer: Same system as League of Legends: damage: atk / (1+(0.1*def)). Defense works for physical damage, special defense for special damage
faq.shiny: How do you get shiny pokemons ?
faq.shiny_answer: You get experience points by playing games. With enough experience, you level up and get a booster pack. Each booster pack gives shards for random pokemon. Use these shards to purchase the shiny emotes of a pokemon in the Collection page, then you will get that one pokemon as a shiny ingame.

faq.code_answer: TypeScript, Phaser, Colyseus. If you want to contribute
